issue.title: [Java] Remove Netty dependency for BufferAllocator and ReferenceManager
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7935](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7935). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
With previous work (ARROW-7329 and ARROW-7505), Netty based allocation is only one of the possible implementations. So we need to revise BufferAllocator and ReferenceManager, to make them general, and independent of Netty libraries.
